title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1beta2\AutoscalingPolicy
name: AutoscalingPolicy
description:
Describes an autoscaling policy for Dataproc cluster autoscaler.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1beta2.AutoscalingPolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.id
params.description: Required. The policy id. The id must contain only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscores (_), and hyphens (-). Cannot begin or end with underscore or hyphen. Must consist of between 3 and 50 characters.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The "resource name" of the autoscaling policy, as described in https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names. For projects.regions.autoscalingPolicies, the resource name of the policy has the following format: projects/{project_id}/regions/{region}/autoscalingPolicies/{policy_id} For projects.locations.autoscalingPolicies, the resource name of the policy has the following format: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location}/autoscalingPolicies/{policy_id}

params.name: data.worker_config
params.description: Required. Describes how the autoscaler will operate for primary workers.

params.name: data.secondary_worker_config
params.description: Optional. Describes how the autoscaler will operate for secondary workers.

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Output only. The "resource name" of the autoscaling policy, as described in https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names.

  • For projects.regions.autoscalingPolicies, the resource name of the policy has the following format: projects/{project_id}/regions/{region}/autoscalingPolicies/{policy_id}
  • For projects.locations.autoscalingPolicies, the resource name of the policy has the following format: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location}/autoscalingPolicies/{policy_id}

Generated from protobuf field string name = 2 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OUTPUT_ONLY];
